features: Experience Superior Comfort: Our latest iJoy Ultra wireless headphones have been designed to offer unparalleled comfort, with soft padding on both the ear cushions and headband. You can now wear our Bluetooth over the ear headphones for extended periods without any discomfort or strain.

Immerse Yourself in Your Music: Our wireless over the ear headphones have been engineered to block out external noise, ensuring that you can fully immerse yourself in your favorite tracks. Let our headphones be your ticket to relaxation, helping you forget about everything else.

Wired Headphones Option: In case you run out of battery, we've got you covered! Each purchase includes a backup audio cable, allowing you to switch to a wired option so you never have to miss out on your music. A USB type C charging cable is also included.

Feature-Rich: Our wireless headphones boast a wide array of features including easy pairing, built-in microphone, micro SD card slot, 10 hours of playtime, volume and music controls, the ability to take/reject calls, among others.

iJoy, Premium Quality You Can Trust: As a worldwide leader in consumer electronics, we take pride in offering products of the highest quality. With our hassle-free return policy, you can trust that your purchase will exceed your expectations.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Premium Cushion Padding The iJoy Ultra Bluetooth headphones boast premium cushion padding, guaranteeing a comfortable and enjoyable listening experience. The ear cups and headband are expertly crafted with high-quality cushioning, ensuring that these headphones can be worn for extended periods without any discomfort or strain. You can indulge in your favorite music for hours on end, without feeling any pressure on your ears or head, thanks to the plush and soft cushioning of the iJoy Ultra headphones. Every Day Essential The iJoy Ultra Bluetooth headphones are a must-have accessory for your daily life, offering exceptional sound quality and comfort that is sure to make them your new favorite headphones. Whether you're commuting to work, working out, or simply relaxing at home, the iJoy Ultra headphones will enhance your listening experience with their premium sound quality and comfortable fit. Wired or Wireless Listening Experience You can rest assured that you will never run out of battery while on a long-haul flight or a road trip, as the iJoy Ultra Bluetooth headphones are equipped with a backup 3.5mm Aux cable, allowing you to continue using your headphones without interruption. This feature ensures that you can enjoy your favorite music or podcasts for as long as you need, without worrying about battery life. In addition, the iJoy Ultra headphones come with a USB Type-C charging cable that ensures a fast and efficient charging experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like these
reviews.reviewText: To be honest I wanted the Apple one because I felt it would be better for me but my financial situation wouldn’t allow me to get them. I made the decision to get these. These are very cute and ycomfortable. I have really enjoyed them. If wearing around your neck they tend to get a little heavy so be aware of this. The sound is good and calls are clear. Great for the price. I haven’t been disappointed. So if you’re in a bind in need headphones you will definitely love these. They are not 100% sound proof but they do have some noise reduction and your caller can still hear you clearly outside. I hope this helps anyone who is struggling financially and need a super great pair of hands try these you will not regret it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These headphones were delivered today and I love them! I like the fit and they’re really loud. They also stay on your head because of the tightness which I appreciate. If you have the volume too loud the sound will leak, but that isn’t an issue for me. I understand that it may be an issue for some though. I like these headphones and I don’t regret buying them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value & sound quality. But they need to be charged frequently

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These headphones are exactly what was advertised. Very aesthetic for the color I bought. They fit very well on my head. Good sound, is crystal clear and just amazing. Really recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Has some major flaws
reviews.reviewText: I was excited when I first got them because they cancel out noise really well, but I keep running into issues. The audio is a tad crackly and fuzzy for one, also they keep disconnecting when I'm using them causing my music to play on blast for everyone to hear out of nowhere even though it has a full battery (not ideal when you're in a library), they also hurt your ears really bad after about 15-20 minutes of use because they are so tight, another thing would be that the plastic feels really cheap and could easily break, and everyone can hear what you're listening to with the headphones on. For these reasons, I wouldn't buy them again. I'd just go for the more expensive over-the-ear headphones. Not worth it at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the money
reviews.reviewText: I love them, they are good quality. My 8 yr old thinks they are hers and keeps taking them lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Son loves this
reviews.reviewText: I was in a rush to give my son a good set of headphones so I grabbed this one and thought maybe I will just get him a better one after the holidays. Seems like I don’t even have to get a better one as he is happy with this set so far. The fit is comfy, the design is great, the sound quality he says is nice, battery life is good too…so far nothing negative about it. I feel more than comfortable recommending this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So damn cute!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. They are so cute. For the price they are I would 100% recommend them. They're a little tight on the ears but that helps them to stay in place so I believe that's good. The pink is a really soft and metalic pink so they're really subtle and cute. They're really confortable. The sound is like a 8/10 just because it is too loud, I have to put it in the lowest on my phone and it still feels like it's on medium, that's the only reason I won't pur 5 stars - but the quality is REALLY good. The battery life is good too. They came fullt charged and I haven't charged them in 2 days. I used them a lot too.Plus: they look really pretty on. I would love to get the apple ones but for a dupe or similar style these are amazing and affordable.
The audio is constantly choppy.. I tried all kinds of fixes but it just doesn’t work ):
